thread.title: European stocks finish lower

title: European stocks finish lower
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 3, 2015, 16:54 BST - UK Markets closed European stocks finish lower View Photo 

Europe's main markets closed lower Friday, with London's benchmark FTSE 100 index of top companies falling 0.67 percent to end the day at 6,585.78 points. 
In the eurozone, the CAC 40 in Paris shed 0.57 percent to 4,808.22 points and Frankfurt's DAX 30 declined 0.37 percent to 11,058.39 points. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
